Package com.mycompany.breakthrough

Class Game

java.lang.Object
com.mycompany.breakthrough.Game
public class Game extends Object
Represents the game logic and state for the Break-through game.

    • Game

      public Game(int boardSize)
      Constructs a new game with the specified board size and initializes players.
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • makeMove

      public void makeMove(int startX, int startY, int endX, int endY) throws IllegalStateException
      Attempts to make a move from a start position to an end position on the board. Checks for win conditions after making a move.
      Parameters:
      startX - the x-coordinate of the start position
      startY - the y-coordinate of the start position
      endX - the x-coordinate of the end position
      endY - the y-coordinate of the end position
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the move is invalid

    • isValidMove

      public boolean isValidMove(int startX, int startY, int endX, int endY)
      Checks if a move is valid based on the game's rules.
      Parameters:
      startX - the x-coordinate of the start position
      startY - the y-coordinate of the start position
      endX - the x-coordinate of the end position
      endY - the y-coordinate of the end position
      Returns:
      true if the move is valid, false otherwise

    • hasWon

      public boolean hasWon(Player player)
      Determines if a player has won the game by checking if any of their dolls have reached the opposite end of the board.
      Parameters:
      player - the player to check for a win
      Returns:
      true if the player has won, false otherwise
